name: HSP_ACCT_EBC_ABN_CND_NB
description: Electronic Birth Certificate abnormal conditions of the newborn.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ABN_COND_NEWBORN_C_NAME
columns.description: The abnormal conditions of the newborn category ID for Electronic Birth Certificate information.
entries: Assisted ventilation required immediately following delivery
Assisted ventilation required for more than six hours
Antibiotics received by the newborn for suspected neonatal sepsis
